story.text: CHICAGO Jan 2 Paper and packaging maker International Paper Co. (IP.N) said on Tuesday its debt at the end of 2006 stood at $7.2 billion, down from $13.4 billion at the end of the 2005 second quarter, just before it started a plan to sell some businesses and focus on two sectors. The company also said it contributed $1 billion to its U.S. pension funds in late 2006.
story.title: international paper year - end debt at $ 7 . 2 billion
